Name: Billionaire Lovers
About the game: You’re a broke college graduate. Your rich, distant uncle has just shown up out of nowhere and given you 100 million dollars! You’re now one of the ultra-rich and getting ready to move into a downtown garden mansion. And right at this moment, four handsome men come into your life. Could this be… the romance you’ve been waiting for!? But wait, there’s something behind their smiles that says otherwise… Elias: Where there’s desire, there’s always a paper trail. Kyle: Let me discover the statistical pattern of your heartbeat. Justin: You’re my one and only friend. Steven: Ladies and gentlemen, remember to follow me on OnlyFuns! Notice You can choose your preferred pronoun as she/he, without affecting the story. For better game experience, 18+ is recommended, although not required. The entire game takes about 2 - 4 hours to complete. If you have two hours to spare, give it a try! Greetings from Developer It's Otttter here! This game was created after I thought about writing an interesting and unexpected story. Thank you so much for playing! I would love to hear your comments or suggestions on Twitter@spa_otter Team Script: Otttter Coding: Otttter CG arts: Zoe English Localization: thirtyfiveowls English Editing: Ivana Nedic
